column4: and one more question: since there are so many problems with wireless nics in linux, why are there not out-of-the-box support for these things? since there is countless documents on this, i think there should be enough manpower, and i guess many of the open source-types could program most anything?
sudo make install if you've already compiled them :)
Or I've got a repository running for those cards
did you get my messages above?
once you get the right config utility, it's easy as pie
